song.title: Kraken's Vengeance
song.info:
Track 7 in the Hysterical Chipdisk. One of the darker pieces in the suite of 12. 4/4, flat 5th based bass riff carries the theme of the tune. Short and sweet, finished in just over a minute and a half.
Released originally in March 1997.
Check traxinspace for the entire disk. http://www.traxinspace.com/profile/andyabstract
